message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down to $12500. This takes into account your needs and my value for the product. Let's see if we can make this work.
